name: Neon Blast: Get High
description:
Use lamps to charge for a shot!
Use jump pads to fast jump high and get extra points!
Use your tap skills to get as high as possible! How high can you get?

NO ADS. NO IAP. JUST FUN

Features:
- One Tap Controls
- Slow Motion
- Juicy Visuals
- Unlimited gameplay
- Optimized Battery Consumption
- Flawless Animations
- Zen visuals change as you advance.

WARNING! Extremely ADDICTING!
